title: Emerald & Diamond Chandbali Jhumka - Pancharatna Shobha
materials: South Sea Pearls. Hyderabadi Polish for lasting shine.
features: Intricate Chandbali design with flowing lines and delicate filigree work. Features a central square-cut Emerald surrounded by Polki diamonds, and smaller pear-shaped Emerald accent at the top. Pearl drops (Muthyalu) add a graceful finish. The design combines traditional Telugu 'Guttapusalu' elements with a modern lightweight construction.
colors: Creamy White (Pearls). A classic South Indian color palette.
occasions: and festive occasions like Diwali and Ugadi. Also suitable for adding a touch of elegance to modern evening wear.
description: This Chandbali Jhumka showcases impeccable craftsmanship and the brilliance of natural emeralds and Polki diamonds. The lightweight design ensures comfortable wear, while the traditional design elements make it a timeless heirloom piece. The Hyderabadi polish guarantees a lasting shine. A symbol of prosperity and elegance.
